creator: axel@pearbough.net
text:
httpd-2.1-cvs build failure:

/usr/local/src/web/httpd-2.0/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=link gcc
-pthread  -O4 -ftracer -funroll-loops -maccumulate-outgoing-args -march=pentium
    -o htpasswd  htpasswd.lo   -lm -lz
/usr/local/src/web/httpd-2.0/srclib/pcre/libpcre.la
/usr/local/src/web/httpd-2.0/srclib/apr-util/libaprutil-1.la -lgdbm -ldb-4.2
-lexpat /usr/local/src/web/httpd-2.0/srclib/apr/libapr-1.la -lrt -lcrypt
-lpthread -ldl
/usr/local/src/web/httpd-2.0/srclib/apr/.libs/libapr-1.so: undefined reference
to `APR_OFF_T_STRFN'
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [htpasswd] Error 1

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text:
Run:
 ./buildconf && ./config.nice && make clean && make

should work.  That stuff was changed last week, requires a re-run of buildconf.
